survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of new employees regarding their onboarding experience within the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better measurement granularity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Ensure the scale is displayed horizontally for better readability.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the onboarding process did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied experiences. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the onboarding process did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during the onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text. Provide a text area with a minimum of 5 lines.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face during the onboarding process?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of the information provided during onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure clarity. This helps identify areas needing improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Display options vertically for clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of the information provided during onboarding?

questions.question_text: Do you feel adequately prepared to perform your job responsibilities after the onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Unsure' option for respondents who may need more time to assess their preparedness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: Do you feel adequately prepared to perform your job responsibilities after the onboarding process?
